text:
@GregAbbott_TX Latest number of coronavirus cases in TX jumped by 1,801 in a single day, the highest daily rate since the state started tracking data. Number of cases reported now 46,999.
Only 678,471 tested out of 29 million people. Good job, TX. Not.
